languages.text: "О, служить вам — честь, Ваша Светлость. И мне безмерно льстит, что мои скромные дарования вызвали ваш интерес, но... Видите ли, Джай Хейдари готова служить вам. В бою и делах, торговле, управлении людьми, оружием и советом, связями и веселой шуткой. Но Джай Хейдари не служит в постели. Я всей душой сожалею, что не смогу подарить вам себя в этом качестве, но будет именно так".

"Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."
languages.original_text: "О, служить вам — честь, Ваша Светлость. И мне безмерно льстит, что мои скромные дарования вызвали ваш интерес, но... Видите ли, Джай Хейдари готова служить вам. В бою и делах, торговле, управлении людьми, оружием и советом, связями и веселой шуткой. Но Джай Хейдари не служит в постели. Я всей душой сожалею, что не смогу подарить вам себя в этом качестве, но будет именно так".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed. I regret with all my soul that I will be unable to offer myself to you in that capacity, but it will be so."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed. I regret with all my soul that I will be unable to offer myself to you in that capacity, but it will be so."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed. I regret with all my soul that I will be unable to offer myself to you in that capacity, but it will be so."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, servirle es un honor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y me siento halagada de que mis humildes regalos hayan despertado su interés, pero... verá, Jae Heydari está dispuesta a servirle de muchas formas: en combate, en negocios, comerciando, gestionando gente, armas y consejos, mediante sus contactos e incluso mediante conversaciones ingeniosas. Pero Jae Heydari no sirve en la cama».
languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, servirle es un honor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y me siento halagada de que mis humildes regalos hayan despertado su interés, pero... verá, Jae Heydari está dispuesta a servirle de muchas formas: en combate, en negocios, comerciando, gestionando gente, armas y consejos, mediante sus contactos e incluso mediante conversaciones ingeniosas. Pero Jae Heydari no sirve en la cama. Lamento con toda mi alma no poder ofrecerme a usted en esa capacidad, pero es lo que hay».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “哦，能为你效劳是我的荣幸，大人。我卑微的天赋能引起您的兴趣，这让我无比荣幸。不过……如你所见，婕伊·海达利可以在很多方面为你服务——战斗、商业、贸易、人员管理、武器、顾问、人脉、与风趣的对答，但婕伊·海达利不会侍寝。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

traits.locale_text: “哦，能为你效劳是我的荣幸，大人。我卑微的天赋能引起您的兴趣，这让我无比荣幸。不过……如你所见，婕伊·海达利可以在很多方面为你服务——战斗、商业、贸易、人员管理、武器、顾问、人脉、与风趣的对答，但婕伊·海达利不会侍寝。我很遗憾无法以这样的身份为你效劳，但恐怕也只能如此了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、あんたに仕えることができるなんて光栄だわ、陛下。あたしのささやかな贈り物に興味を持ってくれたのは嬉しいけど…ジェイ・ヘイダリは色んな形で仕えることができるわ。戦闘やビジネス、貿易、兵員の管理、武器、顧問、人脈、そして楽しい話し相手とかね。だけど、ジェイ・ヘイダリはベッドでの奉仕はしないわ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、あんたに仕えることができるなんて光栄だわ、陛下。あたしのささやかな贈り物に興味を持ってくれたのは嬉しいけど…ジェイ・ヘイダリは色んな形で仕えることができるわ。戦闘やビジネス、貿易、兵員の管理、武器、顧問、人脈、そして楽しい話し相手とかね。だけど、ジェイ・ヘイダリはベッドでの奉仕はしないわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est déjà un grand honneur que de vous servir, Votre Seigneurie, et je suis flattée au-delà des mots à l'idée que mes humbles dons aient suscité votre intérêt, mais... voyez-vous, si Jae Heydari se tient à votre disposition dans bien des domaines, tels que la guerre, le commerce, l'encadrement, l'armement, le réseau et la faconde, elle n'est pas prête pour autant à partager votre couche. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

traits.locale_text: « C'est déjà un grand honneur que de vous servir, Votre Seigneurie, et je suis flattée au-delà des mots à l'idée que mes humbles dons aient suscité votre intérêt, mais... voyez-vous, si Jae Heydari se tient à votre disposition dans bien des domaines, tels que la guerre, le commerce, l'encadrement, l'armement, le réseau et la faconde, elle n'est pas prête pour autant à partager votre couche. Croyez bien que je le regrette de toute mon âme, mais je ne saurais m'offrir à vous de cette manière. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, es ist eine Ehre, Euch zu dienen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und ich fühle mich immens geschmeichelt, dass meine bescheidenen Vorzüge Euer Interesse geweckt haben, doch ... wisst Ihr, Jae Heydari ist bereit, Euch in vielerlei Hinsicht zu dienen: Kampf und Geschäft, Handel, Verwaltung von Männern und Waffen, Ratschläge, Verbindungen und heitere Schlagfertigkeit. Doch Jae Heydari dient nicht im Bett."
languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, es ist eine Ehre, Euch zu dienen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und ich fühle mich immens geschmeichelt, dass meine bescheidenen Vorzüge Euer Interesse geweckt haben, doch ... wisst Ihr, Jae Heydari ist bereit, Euch in vielerlei Hinsicht zu dienen: Kampf und Geschäft, Handel, Verwaltung von Männern und Waffen, Ratschläge, Verbindungen und heitere Schlagfertigkeit. Doch Jae Heydari dient nicht im Bett. Ich bedauere mit all meiner Seele, dass ich nicht in der Lage sein werde, mich Euch auf diese Weise anzubieten, doch so ist es nun einmal."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

languages.text: "Sana hizmet etmek benim için bir onurdur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Naçiz armağanlarımın sende ilgi uyandırmasından sonsuz mutluluk duydum ama şöyle ki... Jae Heydari, güler yüzlü hazırcevaplığıyla sana sayısız şekilde hizmet etmeye hazır: Savaş, iş, ticaret, personel yönetimi, silah, danışmanlık, bağlantı... Ancak Jae Heydari, yatakta hizmet etmez."
languages.original_text: "Oh, serving you is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I am immensely flattered that my humble gifts have stirred your interest, but... you see, Jae Heydari is willing to serve you in many ways: battle and business, trade, the management of men, arms, and counsel, connections, and jocund repartee. But Jae Heydari does not serve in bed."

traits.locale_text: "Ah sana hizmet etmek benim için bir onurdur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ve benim naçiz armağanlarımın ilgini uyandırmasından sonsuz mutluluk duydum ama şöyle ki; Jae Heydari sana güler yüzlü hazırcevaplığıyla sayısız şekilde hizmet etmeye hazırdır: Savaş ve iş, ticaret, personel yönetimi, silah, danışmanlık, bağlantılar... Jae Heydari yatakta hizmet etmez ama."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
